page.title: We elevate industries
page.subtitle: Industries = use cases. Services = technology.
page.modulesDesc: Specific technologies deployed to solve {industry} challenges.
page.joinLeaders: Join other {industry} leaders who are digitizing their operations.

hotelsResorts.title: Hotels & Resorts
hotelsResorts.summary: Elevate guest experiences with seamless digital solutions.

intro.painPoints: Traditional hospitality relies on manual processes, causing long check-in queues and disconnected guest experiences.
intro.outcomes: We digitize the guest journey, enabling contactless entry, automated booking, and personalized concierge services.

digitalLocks.title: Digital / Smart Locks
digitalLocks.description: Keyless entry systems that allow guests to unlock rooms with their smartphones.

digitalCheckin.title: Digital Check-in & Check-out
digitalCheckin.description: Automate the arrival and departure process to reduce wait times and staff workload.

digitalConcierge.title: Digital Concierge
digitalConcierge.description: AI-driven guest assistance for room service, local recommendations, and requests.

pmsBooking.title: PMS / Booking Software
pmsBooking.description: Centralized property management systems to handle reservations and housekeeping.

guestPortal.title: Guest Portal & Communication
guestPortal.description: Unified platform for guest messaging, feedback, and engagement.

vacationRentals.title: Vacation Rentals (FEWO)
vacationRentals.summary: Automate property management and delight guests.

intro.painPoints: Managing multiple vacation properties often involves chaotic key handovers and fragmented communication.
intro.outcomes: Our solutions automate access, guest verification, and property care, making remote management effortless.

digitalLocks.title: Digital / Smart Locks
digitalLocks.description: Secure, remote access control for guests and maintenance staff.

digitalCheckin.title: Digital Check-in & Check-out
digitalCheckin.description: Seamless self-service arrival process with ID verification.

digitalConcierge.title: Digital Concierge
digitalConcierge.description: Digital guidebooks and local tips accessible via mobile.

pmsBooking.title: PMS / Booking Software
pmsBooking.description: Sync availability across Airbnb, Booking.com, and direct channels.

guestPortal.title: Guest Portal & Communication
guestPortal.description: Automated messaging for check-in instructions and house rules.

realEstate.title: Real Estate & Property Management
realEstate.summary: Streamline operations for portfolios of any size.

intro.painPoints: Property managers struggle with paperwork, maintenance tracking, and tenant communication.
intro.outcomes: We provide centralized dashboards and automation tools to manage leases, maintenance, and leads efficiently.

tenantPortals.title: Tenant & Owner Portals
tenantPortals.description: Dedicated access for tenants to pay rent and owners to view reports.

maintenanceAutomation.title: Maintenance Automation
maintenanceAutomation.description: Ticket systems that automatically route requests to vendors.

accessControl.title: Access Control Systems
accessControl.description: Smart entry for common areas and units without physical keys.

leadWorkflows.title: Lead Workflows
leadWorkflows.description: Automated follow-ups for viewing inquiries and applications.

intro.painPoints: Restaurants face high staff turnover, order errors, and thin margins.
intro.outcomes: Our tech stack optimizes table turnover, reduces errors, and boosts customer loyalty through digital integration.

qrOrdering.title: QR Ordering & Payments
qrOrdering.description: Allow customers to order and pay from their table via smartphone.

reservations.title: Reservations Management
reservations.description: Digital booking system to optimize table allocation.

loyaltyCrm.title: Loyalty CRM
loyaltyCrm.description: Reward repeat customers and track dining preferences.

kitchenDisplay.title: Kitchen Display Integrations
kitchenDisplay.description: Send orders directly to kitchen screens to reduce errors.

staffScheduling.title: Staff Scheduling Automation
staffScheduling.description: Smart shifts management based on forecasted demand.

intro.painPoints: Retailers struggle to connect in-store experiences with online data.
intro.outcomes: We help you build an omnichannel strategy that syncs inventory, customers, and sales in real-time.

posIntegrations.title: POS Integrations
posIntegrations.description: Connect physical point-of-sale with your online store.

inventorySync.title: Inventory Sync
inventorySync.description: Real-time stock updates across all sales channels.

customerEngagement.title: Customer Engagement / CRM
customerEngagement.description: Track customer history online and offline.

analyticsDashboards.title: Analytics Dashboards
analyticsDashboards.description: Unified view of sales performance and trends.

automationWorkflows.title: Automation Workflows
automationWorkflows.description: Trigger marketing emails based on purchase behavior.

smesServiceBusinesses.title: SMEs / Service Businesses
smesServiceBusinesses.summary: Scale your service with smart automation.

intro.painPoints: Service businesses get bogged down in scheduling, invoicing, and chasing clients.
intro.outcomes: We automate the busywork so you can focus on delivering great service and growing your client base.

crmPipeline.title: CRM Pipeline
crmPipeline.description: Track leads from initial contact to closed deal.

invoicingAutomation.title: Invoicing Automation
invoicingAutomation.description: Generate and send invoices automatically upon job completion.

customerCommunication.title: Customer Communication
customerCommunication.description: Centralized inbox for email, SMS, and chat.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Track billable hours and revenue growth.

hotelsResorts.title: Hotels & Resorts
hotelsResorts.summary: Verbessern Sie Gästeerlebnisse mit nahtlosen digitalen Lösungen.

intro.painPoints: Traditionelles Gastgewerbe verlässt sich auf manuelle Prozesse, was zu langen Check-in-Warteschlangen und unzusammenhängenden Gästeerlebnissen führt.
intro.outcomes: Wir digitalisieren die Gäste-Journey und ermöglichen kontaktlosen Zugang, automatisierte Buchungen und personalisierten Concierge-Service.

digitalLocks.title: Digitale / Smart Locks
digitalLocks.description: Schlüssellose Zugangssysteme, die es Gästen ermöglichen, Zimmer mit ihrem Smartphone zu öffnen.

digitalCheckin.title: Digitaler Check-in & Check-out
digitalCheckin.description: Automatisieren Sie den Ankunfts- und Abreiseprozess, um Wartezeiten und Arbeitsbelastung zu reduzieren.

digitalConcierge.title: Digitaler Concierge
digitalConcierge.description: KI-gesteuerte Gästebetreuung für Zimmerservice, lokale Empfehlungen und Anfragen.

pmsBooking.title: PMS / Buchungssoftware
pmsBooking.description: Zentralisierte Property-Management-Systeme zur Verwaltung von Reservierungen und Housekeeping.

guestPortal.title: Gästeportal & Kommunikation
guestPortal.description: Einheitliche Plattform für Gästenachrichten, Feedback und Engagement.

benefits: Reduzieren Sie Wartezeiten an der Rezeption um 80%
Steigern Sie den Umsatz durch automatisierte Upsells

vacationRentals.title: Ferienwohnungen (FEWO)
vacationRentals.summary: Automatisieren Sie die Immobilienverwaltung und begeistern Sie Gäste.

intro.painPoints: Die Verwaltung mehrerer Ferienimmobilien beinhaltet oft chaotische Schlüsselübergaben und fragmentierte Kommunikation.
intro.outcomes: Unsere Lösungen automatisieren den Zugang, die Gästeüberprüfung und die Immobilienpflege und machen die Fernverwaltung mühelos.

digitalLocks.title: Digitale / Smart Locks
digitalLocks.description: Sichere Fernzugriffskontrolle für Gäste und Wartungspersonal.

digitalConcierge.description: Digitale Reiseführer und lokale Tipps, zugänglich über Mobilgeräte.

pmsBooking.description: Synchronisieren Sie die Verfügbarkeit über Airbnb, Booking.com und direkte Kanäle.
